document_data.mainbody: '''Chastity domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with chastity-related [[spell]]s and powers.{{Cite dragon/355/Seven Saintly Domains|26}}
document_data.Powers: Once a day, they could remove a spell effect that targeted their body as if they could cast ''[[dispel magic]]''.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[shield of faith]]'', ''[[lesser restoration]]'', and ''[[magic vestment]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[spell immunity]]'', ''[[break enchantment]]'', and ''[[bigby's interposing hand]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[repulsion]]'', ''[[antimagic field]]'', and ''[[mind blank]]''.
